DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to assess the influence of the severity of chronic periodontitis on hemodynamic parameters in hypertensive patients.Secondary purposes of this protocol is to identify evolution of several biomarkers and correlate the clinical situation with oral microflora.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Periodontal Diseases on Vascular Parameters in Patients Suffering of Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Men >40 years moderate and severe generalized chronic periodontitis Former diagnosis of hypertension >12 teeth >70 years smokers (>10 cig/day) body mass index>30 Need of antibioprophylaxis Medical treatment including antiinflammatory drugs and/or antibiotics Refractory form of hypertension aggressive periodontitis
